module.desc: Billing System for ZPanel. This module enables users to sign up and automatically get login details after payment has been confirmed.
module.updatedesc: Version 10.0.5.1 is now more compatible with ZPanel 10.1.0 with a few minor appearance tweaks.

module.desc: Important Downloads is for the Server Administrator to upload files for their clients to use.
module.updatedesc: Version 10.0.0 is the first release and compatible with ZPanel 10.1.0.

module.desc: MyWebSQL is a free, open source, web-based database management tool similar to PhpMyAdmin.
module.updatedesc: Version 10.0.0.1 has had a software update and the main module has been tweaked to be compatible with ZPanel 10.1.0.
